item.title: SHAP visualization for XGBoost in R
item.description: Why SHAP values Local Explanation Consistency in Global Feature Importance SHAP plots SHAP force plot (stack plot) Summary plot Dependence plot Interaction values Why SHAP values SHAPâ€™s main advantages are local explanation and consistency in global model structure. Tree-based machine learning models (random forest, gradient boosted trees, XGBoost) are the most popular non-linear models today. SHAP (SHapley Additive exPlnation) values is claimed to be the most advanced method to interpret results from tree-based models.
